verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Hail Jesus, You’re my King Your life frees me to sing I will praise You all my days You’re perfect in all Your ways. (sisters echo){/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Hail Jesus, You’re my Lord I will obey Your word I want to see Your kingdom come Not my will but Yours be done.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Glory, glory to the Lamb You take me into the land We will conquer in Your name And proclaim that Jesus reigns.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Hail, hail, Lion of Judah How powerful You are Hail, hail Lion of Judah How wonderful You are How wonderful You are.{/lang-eng}
